mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.product_id AS productId, c.quantity, p.name AS productName, /* 修正点1：数据库字段是 main_image_url */ p.main_image_url AS productImage, p.price AS price, /* 修正点2：库存字段是 stock，上架判断逻辑不变 */ (CASE WHEN p.id IS NOT NULL AND p.status = 1 AND p.stock > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS valid FROM tb_cart c LEFT JOIN tb_product p ON c.product_id = p.id WHERE c.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY c.create_time DESC
